title: My New Office Gaming Setup!
description: Buy on Amazon: US:  DE:   Buy on Govee store: US:  DE:   The Govee Envisual is an upgrade to the best TV backlight as the Govee TV backlight T2.  Subscribe for more!  TikTok:  Instagram:  Twitter:   Chapter Titles: 0:00 My New Office 1:31 The Emulator Gaming PC 2:11 Installing Backlight T2 3:50 Audio Upgrades 4:29 More Lights! 6:51 The Reveal
